comment.author: 69587809@N05
comment._content: The army nurses had equivalent army ranks and this picture showing a matron and matron in chief would have had the ranks of major and brigadier. Queen Mary is dressed in lighter colored clothes than in other pictures and, again, there is another woman close by.  Is this Mabell Ogilvy, Countess of Airlie and Lady of the Bedchamber to Queen Mary?
